title: Suds in Your Eye
description: In an attempt to battle the inflationary rents of wartime Mrs Feely invites two other poverty stricken women to move in with her. Unfortunately her house is located in the middle of a San Diego junkyard. But when they find out a crooked lawyer has been pocketing all the property taxes and they face being evicted it's all hands to the pump...
author: Mary Lasswell
